item.title: How to Extract Sandbox data of an Android App?
item.description: A few days ago I faced an issue that was reported to me by one of the beta testers. It was a crash, in the production version, After a lot of struggling with code, I couldnâ€™t reproduce the crash. I understood the problem might be with cached data, I needed to extract the cached data of the installed application (sandbox). There are some ways to do that: Root the device and access the sandbox easily with file explorer applications or anything else.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Diligent Android developer, with more than 5 years of experience, I played my role effectively in the agile teams, on products with more than 5M users. Along with a deep knowledge of Android SDK and a tendency to utilizing the edge-technologies, I can develop professional applications with both Java or Kotlin in the Android platform.
